爱情.explanation:
Refers to romantic love, typically between a man and a woman. It's a noun.
Component Breakdown:
爱 (ài): Love, affection, to like.
情 (qíng): Feeling, emotion, sentiment, passion.

变.explanation: Means to change, to become different, or to transform. As a verb, it indicates a process of alteration.

不仅.explanation:
A conjunction meaning 'not only...'. It's often used in patterns like '不仅...而且...' (not only...but also...).
Component Breakdown:
不 (bù): Not, no.
仅 (jǐn): Only, merely, alone.

从来.explanation:
An adverb meaning 'always', 'at all times', 'all along'. Often used with a negative to mean 'never'.
Component Breakdown:
从 (cóng): From, since.
来 (lái): To come, to arrive.

法律.explanation:
A noun meaning 'law', 'statute'.
Component Breakdown:
法 (fǎ): Law, method, way.
律 (lǜ): Law, statute, rule.

感动.explanation:
As a verb, it means to move someone emotionally or to touch someone's feelings.
Component Breakdown:
感 (gǎn): To feel, to sense, to move (emotionally).
动 (dòng): To move, to act.

刚.explanation: An adverb indicating that an action has taken place a very short time ago; 'just', 'just now'.

够.explanation: As a verb, it means 'to be enough', 'to suffice'. As an adverb, it can mean 'enough' or 'sufficiently'.

互相.explanation:
An adverb meaning 'mutually', 'each other'. Indicates a reciprocal action or relationship.
Component Breakdown:
互 (hù): Mutual, each other.
相 (xiāng): Each other, one another; mutually.

加班.explanation:
A verb phrase meaning 'to work overtime', 'to work extra hours'.
Component Breakdown:
加 (jiā): To add, to increase.
班 (bān): Work shift, class, group.

即使.explanation: A conjunction meaning 'even if', 'even though'. Introduces a concessive clause.

接受.explanation:
A verb meaning 'to accept', 'to receive' (e.g., an invitation, a gift, criticism).
Component Breakdown:
接 (jiē): To receive, to connect, to meet.
受 (shòu): To receive, to accept, to suffer.

开玩笑.explanation:
A common verb phrase meaning 'to joke', 'to jest', 'to make fun of'.
Component Breakdown:
开 (kāi): To open, to start (here, part of a set phrase).
玩 (wán): To play, to have fun.
笑 (xiào): To laugh, to smile; a joke.

浪漫.explanation: An adjective meaning 'romantic'. This is often a phonetic loanword.

俩.explanation: A numeral-measure word meaning 'two' or 'both', used for people. It's a colloquial contraction of 两个 (liǎng ge).

亮.explanation: As a verb, 'to shine', 'to be lit', 'to show'. As an adjective, 'bright', 'light'.

脾气.explanation:
A noun referring to 'temper', 'disposition', 'bad temper'.
Component Breakdown:
脾 (pí): Spleen (in TCM, related to temperament).
气 (qì): Air, gas, spirit, temper.

普通.explanation:
An adjective meaning 'common', 'ordinary', 'average'.
Component Breakdown:
普 (pǔ): General, universal.
通 (tōng): To go through, common, general.

缺点.explanation:
A noun meaning 'shortcoming', 'defect', 'weakness', 'disadvantage'.
Component Breakdown:
缺 (quē): To lack, to be short of; a deficiency.
点 (diǎn): Point, spot, aspect.

生活.explanation:
As a noun, it means 'life', 'livelihood'. As a verb, it means 'to live'.
Component Breakdown:
生 (shēng): To be born, life, to live.
活 (huó): To live, alive, vivid.

适合.explanation:
A verb meaning 'to suit', 'to fit'. Indicates appropriateness for a situation, person, or purpose.
Component Breakdown:
适 (shì): To suit, to fit, appropriate.
合 (hé): To combine, to suit, to be equal to.

熟悉.explanation:
A verb meaning 'to be familiar with', 'to know well'.
Component Breakdown:
熟 (shú): Ripe, cooked, familiar, skilled.
悉 (xī): To know, to learn.

吸引.explanation:
A verb meaning 'to attract', 'to draw (attention, interest)'.
Component Breakdown:
吸 (xī): To suck, to absorb, to attract.
引 (yǐn): To draw, to lead, to attract.

羡慕.explanation:
A verb meaning 'to envy', 'to admire' (often with a desire to have what the other person has).
Component Breakdown:
羡 (xiàn): To envy, to admire.
慕 (mù): To admire, to adore.

新鲜感.explanation:
A noun phrase meaning 'feeling of freshness', 'novelty'.
Component Breakdown:
新鲜 (xīnxiān): Fresh, new.
感 (gǎn): Feeling, sense.

星星.explanation: A noun meaning 'star' (in the sky). The repetition of 星 (xīng) is common for diminutive or familiar nouns.

性格.explanation:
A noun meaning 'character', 'personality', 'disposition'.
Component Breakdown:
性 (xìng): Nature, character, gender.
格 (gé): Style, pattern, character.

幸福.explanation:
An adjective meaning 'happy', 'blessed', 'fortunate'. Refers to a deeper sense of happiness and well-being.
Component Breakdown:
幸 (xìng): Good fortune, lucky, happiness.
福 (fú): Blessing, good fortune, happiness.

印象.explanation:
A noun meaning 'impression' (the effect or feeling retained as a result of experience).
Component Breakdown:
印 (yìn): To print, a seal, a mark.
象 (xiàng): Elephant, image, phenomenon.

幽默.explanation: An adjective meaning 'humorous'. This is a phonetic loanword from English 'humor'.

原因.explanation:
A noun meaning 'reason', 'cause'.
Component Breakdown:
原 (yuán): Original, former, source.
因 (yīn): Cause, reason, because.

祝.explanation: A verb meaning 'to wish' (expressing good wishes), 'to pray for'.

自然.explanation:
As a noun, 'nature'. As an adverb, 'naturally', 'certainly'. As an adjective, 'natural'.
Component Breakdown:
自 (zì): Self, from.
然 (rán): So, thus, correct, right; (suffix like -ly or -ness).

最好.explanation:
An adverb meaning 'had better', 'it would be best'. Indicates a strong suggestion or advice.
Component Breakdown:
最 (zuì): Most, -est (superlative prefix).
好 (hǎo): Good, well.

毕业.explanation:
To graduate from school.
Component Breakdown:
毕 (bì): To finish, to complete, entire.
业 (yè): Profession, course of study, enterprise.

不同.explanation:
Adjective meaning 'different', 'not the same'.
Component Breakdown:
不 (bù): Not, no.
同 (tóng): Same, alike, together.

差不多.explanation:
Adverb meaning 'almost', 'nearly', 'about the same'.
Component Breakdown:
差 (chà): Differ from, short of.
不 (bù): Not.
多 (duō): Much, many.

当.explanation: As a preposition, means 'when', 'just at (a time or place)'. Can also mean 'to be', 'to serve as'.

短信.explanation:
Noun meaning 'text message', 'SMS'.
Component Breakdown:
短 (duǎn): Short.
信 (xìn): Letter, message, trust.

而.explanation: Conjunction indicating a contrast ('while', 'yet') or transition.

丰富.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to enrich'; Adjective meaning 'rich', 'abundant', 'plentiful'.
Component Breakdown:
丰 (fēng): Abundant, plentiful.
富 (fù): Rich, wealthy.

感到.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to feel', 'to sense', 'to perceive'.
Component Breakdown:
感 (gǎn): To feel, to sense.
到 (dào): To arrive, (resultative complement indicating achievement).

逛.explanation: Verb meaning 'to stroll', 'to roam', 'to wander around' (often for leisure, like window shopping).

好像.explanation:
Adverb meaning 'as if', 'to seem like'.
Component Breakdown:
好 (hǎo): Good, very.
像 (xiàng): To be like, image.

交.explanation: Verb meaning 'to make (friends)', 'to hand over', 'to intersect'.

交流.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to exchange', 'to communicate', 'to interact'.
Component Breakdown:
交 (jiāo): To intersect, exchange.
流 (liú): To flow, to spread.

及时.explanation:
Adverb meaning 'in time', 'promptly', 'without delay'.
Component Breakdown:
及 (jí): To reach, and.
时 (shí): Time, when.

镜子.explanation:
Noun meaning 'mirror'.
Component Breakdown:
镜 (jìng): Mirror, lens.
子 (zi): Noun suffix.

聚会.explanation:
Noun/Verb meaning 'party', 'gathering'; 'to have a party', 'to get together'.
Component Breakdown:
聚 (jù): To gather, to assemble.
会 (huì): To meet, meeting.

困难.explanation:
Noun meaning 'difficulty', 'hardship'; Adjective meaning 'difficult'.
Component Breakdown:
困 (kùn): Trapped, difficult, sleepy.
难 (nán): Difficult, hard.

联系.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to contact', 'to get in touch with'; Noun meaning 'connection', 'contact'.
Component Breakdown:
联 (lián): To connect, to join.
系 (xì): System, to be, to connect.

理解.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to understand', 'to comprehend'.
Component Breakdown:
理 (lǐ): Reason, logic, to manage.
解 (jiě): To understand, to solve, to untie.

麻烦.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to bother'; Noun meaning 'trouble'; Adjective meaning 'troublesome'.
Component Breakdown:
麻 (má): Hemp, numb.
烦 (fán): Annoyed, trouble.

陪.explanation: Verb meaning 'to accompany', 'to keep someone company'.

平时.explanation:
Noun meaning 'normal times', 'usually', 'ordinarily'.
Component Breakdown:
平 (píng): Flat, level, ordinary.
时 (shí): Time.

身边.explanation:
Noun meaning 'at or by one's side'.
Component Breakdown:
身 (shēn): Body, person.
边 (biān): Side, edge.

适应.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to adapt', 'to get used to', 'to suit'.
Component Breakdown:
适 (shì): To suit, to fit.
应 (yìng): To respond, to suit.

讨厌.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to dislike', 'to loathe'; Adjective meaning 'disgusting', 'annoying'.
Component Breakdown:
讨 (tǎo): To ask for, to invite (here, invites dislike).
厌 (yàn): To detest, to be fed up.

无聊.explanation:
Adjective meaning 'boring', 'bored', 'senseless'.
Component Breakdown:
无 (wú): Without, no.
聊 (liáo): To chat, to rely on (here implies lack of substance).

校园.explanation:
Noun meaning '(school) campus'.
Component Breakdown:
校 (xiào): School.
园 (yuán): Garden, park, campus.

友谊.explanation:
Noun meaning 'friendship'.
Component Breakdown:
友 (yǒu): Friend.
谊 (yì): Friendship.

真正.explanation:
Adjective meaning 'true', 'real', 'genuine'.
Component Breakdown:
真 (zhēn): Real, true.
正 (zhèng): Right, proper, main.

正好.explanation:
Adverb meaning 'just in time', 'just right', 'coincidentally'.
Component Breakdown:
正 (zhèng): Just, right.
好 (hǎo): Good, well (here, indicates 'just right').

周围.explanation:
Noun meaning 'surrounding', 'around'.
Component Breakdown:
周 (zhōu): Circle, week, around.
围 (wéi): To surround, to encircle.

专门.explanation:
Adverb meaning 'specially', 'specialized'.
Component Breakdown:
专 (zhuān): Special, concentrated.
门 (mén): Door, field, branch (of study).

安排.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to arrange', 'to plan'; Noun meaning 'arrangement'.
Component Breakdown:
安 (ān): Safe, calm, to place.
排 (pái): To arrange, to line up.

本来.explanation:
Adverb meaning 'originally', 'at first', 'it goes without saying'.
Component Breakdown:
本 (běn): Root, origin, originally.
来 (lái): To come.

笔试.explanation:
Noun meaning 'written examination'.
Component Breakdown:
笔 (bǐ): Pen, writing.
试 (shì): To test, to try; exam.

不管.explanation: Conjunction meaning 'no matter (what, how, etc.)', 'regardless of'.

材料.explanation:
Noun meaning 'material', 'data', 'stuff'.
Component Breakdown:
材 (cái): Material, timber.
料 (liào): Material, stuff, to expect.

诚实.explanation:
Adjective meaning 'honest', 'truthful'.
Component Breakdown:
诚 (chéng): Sincere, honest.
实 (shí): Real, true, solid.

负责.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to be responsible for', 'to be in charge of'.
Component Breakdown:
负 (fù): To bear, to carry (responsibility).
责 (zé): Duty, responsibility.

符合.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to accord with', 'to conform to', 'to meet (standards)'.
Component Breakdown:
符 (fú): Symbol, to correspond.
合 (hé): To match, to suit, to combine.

改变.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to change', 'to alter'; Noun meaning 'change'.
Component Breakdown:
改 (gǎi): To change, to alter.
变 (biàn): To change, to become.

感觉.explanation:
Noun meaning 'feeling', 'sensation'; Verb meaning 'to feel', 'to think'.
Component Breakdown:
感 (gǎn): To feel, to sense.
觉 (jué): To feel, to sense; sleep.

顾客.explanation:
Noun meaning 'customer', 'client'.
Component Breakdown:
顾 (gù): To look after, to attend to.
客 (kè): Guest, customer.

紧张.explanation:
Adjective meaning 'nervous', 'tense', 'intense'.
Component Breakdown:
紧 (jǐn): Tight, tense.
张 (zhāng): To stretch, to open up; nervous.

留.explanation: Verb meaning 'to leave (behind)', 'to stay', 'to keep', 'to reserve'.

另外.explanation: Conjunction/Adverb meaning 'besides', 'in addition', 'furthermore'; can also mean 'other'.

律师.explanation:
Noun meaning 'lawyer'.
Component Breakdown:
律 (lǜ): Law.
师 (shī): Teacher, master, professional.

面试.explanation:
Noun/Verb meaning 'interview' (for a job, etc.); 'to interview'.
Component Breakdown:
面 (miàn): Face, surface, side.
试 (shì): To test, to try; exam.

能力.explanation:
Noun meaning 'ability', 'capability', 'competence'.
Component Breakdown:
能 (néng): Can, to be able to; ability.
力 (lì): Power, strength, ability.

判断.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to judge', 'to decide'; Noun meaning 'judgment'.
Component Breakdown:
判 (pàn): To judge, to discern.
断 (duàn): To decide, to break, to cut off.

收入.explanation:
Noun meaning 'income', 'revenue'.
Component Breakdown:
收 (shōu): To receive, to collect.
入 (rù): To enter.

提供.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to provide', 'to supply', 'to offer'.
Component Breakdown:
提 (tí): To carry, to raise, to put forward.
供 (gōng): To supply, to provide.

挺.explanation: Adverb meaning 'quite', 'rather', 'very'. Can also mean 'to stick out'.

通知.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to inform', 'to notify'; Noun meaning 'notice', 'notification'.
Component Breakdown:
通 (tōng): To go through, to communicate.
知 (zhī): To know, to inform.

体育馆.explanation:
Noun meaning 'gymnasium', 'stadium'.
Component Breakdown:
体 (tǐ): Body.
育 (yù): To educate, to raise.
馆 (guǎn): Hall, building (for a specific purpose).

信心.explanation:
Noun meaning 'confidence', 'faith'.
Component Breakdown:
信 (xìn): Trust, faith, letter.
心 (xīn): Heart, mind.

应聘.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to apply for a job', 'to accept an offer of employment'.
Component Breakdown:
应 (yìng): To respond, to answer (a call).
聘 (pìn): To hire, to engage.

约会.explanation:
Noun/Verb meaning '(romantic) date'; 'to go on a date'.
Component Breakdown:
约 (yuē): To make an appointment, to invite.
会 (huì): To meet, meeting.

咱们.explanation: Pronoun meaning 'we', 'us' (inclusive - includes the person being spoken to).

招聘.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to recruit', 'to invite applications for a job'.
Component Breakdown:
招 (zhāo): To recruit, to beckon.
聘 (pìn): To hire, to engage.

正式.explanation:
Adjective meaning 'formal', 'official'.
Component Breakdown:
正 (zhèng): Proper, right, formal.
式 (shì): Style, type, form.

专业.explanation:
Noun meaning 'major (in college)', 'specialty', 'profession'.
Component Breakdown:
专 (zhuān): Special, focused.
业 (yè): Profession, course of study.

准时.explanation:
Adjective meaning 'punctual', 'on time'.
Component Breakdown:
准 (zhǔn): Accurate, standard, allowed.
时 (shí): Time.

按.explanation: Preposition meaning 'according to', 'in accordance with'. Can also mean 'to press'.

按时.explanation:
Adverb meaning 'on time', 'on schedule', 'punctually'.
Component Breakdown:
按 (àn): According to.
时 (shí): Time.

按照.explanation:
Preposition meaning 'according to', 'in accordance with', 'in the light of'.
Component Breakdown:
按 (àn): According to.
照 (zhào): According to, to reflect, to shine.

保证.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to guarantee', 'to ensure'; Noun meaning 'guarantee'.
Component Breakdown:
保 (bǎo): To protect, to guarantee.
证 (zhèng): To prove, proof, certificate.

并.explanation: Adverb used before a negative for emphasis ('actually not', 'definitely not'); Conjunction meaning 'and', 'furthermore'.

不得不.explanation:
Phrase meaning 'have to', 'must', 'cannot but'.
Component Breakdown:
不 (bù): Not.
得 (dé): Must (here).
不 (bù): Not.

成功.explanation:
Adjective meaning 'successful'; Noun meaning 'success'.
Component Breakdown:
成 (chéng): To succeed.
功 (gōng): Merit, achievement, success.

调查.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to investigate', 'to survey'; Noun meaning 'investigation', 'survey'.
Component Breakdown:
调 (diào): To investigate, to transfer.
查 (chá): To check, to investigate.

方法.explanation:
Noun meaning 'method', 'way', 'means'.
Component Breakdown:
方 (fāng): Square, direction, method.
法 (fǎ): Law, method.

份.explanation: Measure word for portions, copies, jobs, newspapers, etc.

感谢.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to thank', 'to be grateful'.
Component Breakdown:
感 (gǎn): To feel.
谢 (xiè): To thank.

奖金.explanation:
Noun meaning 'bonus', 'money award'.
Component Breakdown:
奖 (jiǎng): Award, prize.
金 (jīn): Gold, money.

计划.explanation:
Noun meaning 'plan', 'project'; Verb meaning 'to plan'.
Component Breakdown:
计 (jì): To calculate, to plan.
划 (huà): To draw, to plan.

积累.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to accumulate', 'to build up'.
Component Breakdown:
积 (jī): To accumulate.
累 (lěi): To accumulate.

经验.explanation:
Noun meaning 'experience'.
Component Breakdown:
经 (jīng): To pass through, to experience.
验 (yàn): To test, to examine; experience.

生意.explanation:
Noun meaning 'business', 'trade'.
Component Breakdown:
生 (shēng): Life, to generate.
意 (yì): Idea, meaning, intention.

顺利.explanation:
Adjective meaning 'smooth', 'successful', 'without a hitch'.
Component Breakdown:
顺 (shùn): Smooth, along.
利 (lì): Benefit, sharp, smooth.

提.explanation: Verb meaning 'to mention', 'to bring up', 'to lift', 'to carry'.

提前.explanation:
Verb/Adverb meaning 'to do (sth) in advance', 'ahead of time'.
Component Breakdown:
提 (tí): To shift to an earlier time.
前 (qián): Before, front.

提醒.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to remind', 'to warn'.
Component Breakdown:
提 (tí): To mention.
醒 (xǐng): To wake up, to be awake.

完全.explanation:
Adverb meaning 'completely', 'entirely', 'fully'.
Component Breakdown:
完 (wán): To finish, complete.
全 (quán): All, whole, entire.

消息.explanation:
Noun meaning 'news', 'information', 'message'.
Component Breakdown:
消 (xiāo): To disappear, news.
息 (xi): News, breath, interest.

一切.explanation:
Pronoun meaning 'all', 'everything', 'every'.
Component Breakdown:
一 (yī): One.
切 (qiè): All, every (also means 'to cut').

原来.explanation:
Adjective meaning 'original', 'former'; Adverb meaning 'originally', 'as it turns out', 'actually'.
Component Breakdown:
原 (yuán): Original, source.
来 (lái): To come.

知识.explanation:
Noun meaning 'knowledge'.
Component Breakdown:
知 (zhī): To know.
识 (shi): To know, knowledge.

赚.explanation: Verb meaning 'to earn (money)', 'to make a profit'.

标准.explanation:
Noun meaning 'standard', 'criterion'; Adjective meaning 'standard'.
Component Breakdown:
标 (biāo): Mark, sign, standard.
准 (zhǔn): Standard, accurate.

打折.explanation:
Verb phrase meaning 'to give a discount'.
Component Breakdown:
打 (dǎ): To hit, to make (here, part of a set phrase).
折 (zhé): Discount, to break, to fold.

购买.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to buy', 'to purchase' (more formal than 买).
Component Breakdown:
购 (gòu): To buy, to purchase.
买 (mǎi): To buy.

购物.explanation:
Verb phrase meaning 'to go shopping', 'to buy things'.
Component Breakdown:
购 (gòu): To buy.
物 (wù): Thing, object, matter.

光.explanation: Adverb meaning 'only', 'merely'; Noun meaning 'light'; Adjective meaning 'bare'.

广告.explanation:
Noun meaning 'advertisement'.
Component Breakdown:
广 (guǎng): Wide, broad, widespread.
告 (gào): To tell, to inform, to announce.

家具.explanation:
Noun meaning 'furniture'.
Component Breakdown:
家 (jiā): Home, family.
具 (jù): Tool, utensil, furniture.

价格.explanation:
Noun meaning 'price'.
Component Breakdown:
价 (jià): Price, value.
格 (gé): Form, standard, pattern.

考虑.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to consider', 'to think over'.
Component Breakdown:
考 (kǎo): To test, to examine, to think.
虑 (lǜ): To consider, to worry.

肯定.explanation:
Adverb meaning 'surely', 'certainly'; Verb meaning 'to affirm'; Adjective meaning 'definite'.
Component Breakdown:
肯 (kěn): To be willing to, to agree.
定 (dìng): To fix, to decide, definite.

浪费.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to waste'; Adjective meaning 'wasteful'.
Component Breakdown:
浪 (làng): Wave, unrestrained.
费 (fèi): To spend, fee, waste.

流行.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to be popular', 'to be prevalent'; Adjective meaning 'popular', 'fashionable'.
Component Breakdown:
流 (liú): To flow, to spread.
行 (xíng): To go, to walk, to be current.

年龄.explanation:
Noun meaning 'age'.
Component Breakdown:
年 (nián): Year.
龄 (líng): Age.

商场.explanation:
Noun meaning 'shopping mall', 'department store'.
Component Breakdown:
商 (shāng): Commerce, business.
场 (chǎng): Place, field, market.

实际.explanation:
Noun meaning 'reality', 'practice'; Adjective meaning 'actual', 'practical'.
Component Breakdown:
实 (shí): Real, true.
际 (jì): Border, between, actual.

实在.explanation:
Adverb meaning 'really', 'indeed'; Adjective meaning 'honest', 'real'.
Component Breakdown:
实 (shí): Real, true.
在 (zài): To be at, in.

受到.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to receive', 'to get', 'to suffer' (often abstract things like influence, praise, criticism).
Component Breakdown:
受 (shòu): To receive, to accept.
到 (dào): To arrive, (resultative complement).

顺便.explanation:
Adverb meaning 'in passing', 'conveniently', 'by the way'.
Component Breakdown:
顺 (shùn): Along, following.
便 (biàn): Convenient, then.

台.explanation: Measure word for machines, computers, performances, etc. Also means 'platform', 'stage'.

味道.explanation:
Noun meaning 'taste', 'flavor', 'smell', 'odor'.
Component Breakdown:
味 (wèi): Taste, smell.
道 (dào): Way, path, principle.

现金.explanation:
Noun meaning 'cash'.
Component Breakdown:
现 (xiàn): Present, current, cash.
金 (jīn): Gold, money.

效果.explanation:
Noun meaning 'effect', 'result', 'outcome'.
Component Breakdown:
效 (xiào): Effect, efficacy.
果 (guǒ): Fruit, result.

样子.explanation:
Noun meaning 'look', 'appearance', 'manner', 'style', 'sample'.
Component Breakdown:
样 (yàng): Appearance, pattern, sample.
子 (zi): Noun suffix.

邀请.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to invite'; Noun meaning 'invitation'.
Component Breakdown:
邀 (yāo): To invite.
请 (qǐng): To request, please, to invite.

艺术.explanation:
Noun meaning 'art'.
Component Breakdown:
艺 (yì): Skill, art.
术 (shù): Method, technique, art.

优点.explanation:
Noun meaning 'merit', 'advantage', 'strong point'.
Component Breakdown:
优 (yōu): Excellent, superior.
点 (diǎn): Point, aspect.

咱.explanation: Pronoun meaning 'I', 'we', 'us' (inclusive, similar to 咱们, often used in Northern China).

制冷.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to refrigerate', 'to cool'.
Component Breakdown:
制 (zhì): To make, to manufacture, to control.
冷 (lěng): Cold.

质量.explanation:
Noun meaning 'quality'. (Can also mean 'mass' in physics).
Component Breakdown:
质 (zhì): Quality, nature, substance.
量 (liàng): Quantity, amount, to measure.

做客.explanation:
Verb phrase meaning 'to be a guest'.
Component Breakdown:
做 (zuò): To do, to make, to be.
客 (kè): Guest.

百分之.explanation:
Phrase meaning 'percent'. Used as '百分之X' (bǎi fēn zhī X) to mean 'X percent'.
Component Breakdown:
百 (bǎi): Hundred.
分 (fēn): To divide, part.
之 (zhī): Possessive particle, 'of'.

倍.explanation: Measure word meaning 'times', '-fold'. E.g., 三倍 (sān bèi) means 'three times' or 'threefold'.

打扰.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to disturb', 'to bother', 'to interrupt'.
Component Breakdown:
打 (dǎ): To hit (here, part of a set phrase).
扰 (rǎo): To disturb, to trouble.

方面.explanation:
Noun meaning 'aspect', 'side', 'respect'.
Component Breakdown:
方 (fāng): Direction, side.
面 (miàn): Face, side, surface.

购.explanation: Verb meaning 'to buy', 'to purchase'. Often seen in 购物 (gòuwù) or 购买 (gòumǎi).

果汁.explanation:
Noun meaning 'fruit juice'.
Component Breakdown:
果 (guǒ): Fruit.
汁 (zhī): Juice.

好处.explanation:
Noun meaning 'benefit', 'advantage', 'good point'.
Component Breakdown:
好 (hǎo): Good.
处 (chù): Place, point, aspect.

获得.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to get', 'to obtain', 'to achieve', 'to gain'.
Component Breakdown:
获 (huò): To obtain, to capture.
得 (dé): To get, to obtain.

活动.explanation:
Noun meaning 'activity', 'event'; Verb meaning 'to move about', 'to exercise'.
Component Breakdown:
活 (huó): Alive, to live.
动 (dòng): To move.

会员卡.explanation:
Noun meaning 'membership card'.
Component Breakdown:
会 (huì): Association, meeting.
员 (yuán): Member.
卡 (kǎ): Card.

价钱.explanation:
Noun meaning 'price' (more colloquial than 价格).
Component Breakdown:
价 (jià): Price.
钱 (qián): Money.

降低.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to lower', 'to reduce', 'to decrease'.
Component Breakdown:
降 (jiàng): To fall, to lower.
低 (dī): Low.

竟然.explanation: Adverb indicating something unexpected; 'unexpectedly', 'to one's surprise', 'actually'.

举办.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to hold', 'to conduct' (an event, meeting, exhibition).
Component Breakdown:
举 (jǔ): To lift, to hold, to conduct.
办 (bàn): To do, to handle, to manage.

举行.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to hold' (a meeting, ceremony, event). Similar to 举办 but often implies a more formal or grand occasion.
Component Breakdown:
举 (jǔ): To hold.
行 (xíng): To carry out, to perform.

例如.explanation:
Verb/Conjunction meaning 'for example', 'for instance', 'such as'.
Component Breakdown:
例 (lì): Example.
如 (rú): As, like, for example.

满.explanation: Verb meaning 'to reach a quota or limit'; Adjective meaning 'full'.

免费.explanation:
Verb/Adjective meaning 'to be free of charge', 'free'.
Component Breakdown:
免 (miǎn): To exempt, to avoid.
费 (fèi): Fee, cost.

皮肤.explanation:
Noun meaning 'skin'.
Component Breakdown:
皮 (pí): Skin, leather.
肤 (fū): Skin.

其中.explanation:
Noun/Pronoun meaning 'among (which, them, etc.)', 'therein'.
Component Breakdown:
其 (qí): Its, his, her, their.
中 (zhōng): Middle, in.

情况.explanation:
Noun meaning 'situation', 'circumstances', 'condition'.
Component Breakdown:
情 (qíng): Situation, feeling.
况 (kuàng): Situation, condition.

售货员.explanation:
Noun meaning 'salesperson', 'shop assistant'.
Component Breakdown:
售 (shòu): To sell.
货 (huò): Goods.
员 (yuán): Member, personnel.

所有.explanation:
Adjective/Pronoun meaning 'all', 'everything', 'to own'.
Component Breakdown:
所 (suǒ): That which, particle.
有 (yǒu): To have.

袜子.explanation:
Noun meaning 'socks', 'stockings'.
Component Breakdown:
袜 (wà): Socks.
子 (zi): Noun suffix.

西红柿.explanation:
Noun meaning 'tomato'.
Component Breakdown:
西 (xī): West (implying foreign origin).
红 (hóng): Red.
柿 (shì): Persimmon (used here, but the whole means tomato).

小朋友.explanation:
Noun meaning 'kid', 'child' (a friendly term).
Component Breakdown:
小 (xiǎo): Small, little.
朋友 (péngyou): Friend.

小说.explanation:
Noun meaning 'novel', 'fiction'.
Component Breakdown:
小 (xiǎo): Small.
说 (shuō): To speak, story, theory.

修理.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to repair', 'to mend', 'to fix'.
Component Breakdown:
修 (xiū): To repair, to build.
理 (lǐ): To put in order, to manage.

折.explanation: Noun meaning 'discount' (in 打折); Verb meaning 'to break', 'to fold'.

支持.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to support', 'to back'; Noun meaning 'support'.
Component Breakdown:
支 (zhī): To support, branch.
持 (chí): To hold, to maintain.

值得.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to be worth', 'to deserve'.
Component Breakdown:
值 (zhí): Value, worth.
得 (dé): To get, must, (indicates worthiness).

超过.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to exceed', 'to surpass', 'to overtake'.
Component Breakdown:
超 (chāo): To exceed, to surpass.
过 (guò): To pass, to cross.

抽烟.explanation:
Verb phrase meaning 'to smoke (a cigarette, pipe, etc.)'.
Component Breakdown:
抽 (chōu): To draw out, to pump, to smoke.
烟 (yān): Smoke, tobacco, cigarette.

窗户.explanation:
Noun meaning 'window'.
Component Breakdown:
窗 (chuāng): Window.
户 (hu): Door, household.

出现.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to appear', 'to emerge', 'to arise'.
Component Breakdown:
出 (chū): To go out, to appear.
现 (xiàn): To appear, present.

大夫.explanation:
Noun meaning 'doctor' (colloquial, especially in Northern China).
Component Breakdown:
大 (dà): Big.
夫 (fu): Man, husband (here, part of a set term).

掉.explanation: Verb meaning 'to fall', 'to drop', 'to lose'. Often used after verbs as a resultative complement indicating completion, removal, or falling.

动作.explanation:
Noun meaning 'action', 'movement', 'motion'.
Component Breakdown:
动 (dòng): To move.
作 (zuò): To make, to do, action.

肚子.explanation:
Noun meaning 'belly', 'abdomen', 'stomach'.
Component Breakdown:
肚 (dù): Belly.
子 (zi): Noun suffix.

烦恼.explanation:
Adjective meaning 'worried', 'vexed', 'troubled'; Noun meaning 'worry', 'trouble'.
Component Breakdown:
烦 (fán): Annoyed, vexed.
恼 (nǎo): Angry, annoyed.

反对.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to oppose', 'to object to', 'to be against'.
Component Breakdown:
反 (fǎn): Opposite, against.
对 (duì): Towards, correct, to oppose.

感情.explanation:
Noun meaning 'feeling', 'emotion', 'affection', 'love'.
Component Breakdown:
感 (gǎn): Feeling, sense.
情 (qíng): Feeling, emotion.

估计.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to estimate', 'to reckon', 'to guess'.
Component Breakdown:
估 (gū): To estimate, to guess.
计 (jì): To calculate, to plan.

后悔.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to regret', 'to repent'.
Component Breakdown:
后 (hòu): After, behind.
悔 (huǐ): To regret.

减肥.explanation:
Verb phrase meaning 'to lose weight', 'to go on a diet'.
Component Breakdown:
减 (jiǎn): To reduce, to subtract.
肥 (féi): Fat, fertile.

教授.explanation:
Noun meaning 'professor'.
Component Breakdown:
教 (jiào): To teach.
授 (shòu): To confer, to grant, to teach.

既.explanation: Adverb/Conjunction meaning 'since', 'as', 'both... (and...)'. Often used with '又' (yòu) or '也' (yě).

精神.explanation:
Noun meaning 'spirit', 'mind', 'consciousness', 'essence'; Adjective meaning 'vigorous', 'lively'.
Component Breakdown:
精 (jīng): Essence, spirit, refined.
神 (shén): God, spirit, mind.

咳嗽.explanation:
Verb/Noun meaning 'to cough'; 'cough'.
Component Breakdown:
咳 (ké): To cough.
嗽 (sou): To cough.

空气.explanation:
Noun meaning 'air'.
Component Breakdown:
空 (kōng): Empty, air, sky.
气 (qì): Air, gas, spirit.

来不及.explanation:
Verb phrase meaning 'there's not enough time to', 'it's too late to'.
Component Breakdown:
来 (lái): To come.
不 (bù): Not.
及 (jí): To reach, in time.

流血.explanation:
Verb phrase meaning 'to bleed'.
Component Breakdown:
流 (liú): To flow.
血 (xiě): Blood.

气候.explanation:
Noun meaning 'climate'.
Component Breakdown:
气 (qì): Air, weather.
候 (hòu): Time, season, to wait.

散步.explanation:
Verb phrase meaning 'to take a walk', 'to stroll'.
Component Breakdown:
散 (sàn): To scatter, to disperse.
步 (bù): Step, walk.

说明.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to explain', 'to illustrate', 'to show'; Noun meaning 'explanation', 'directions'.
Component Breakdown:
说 (shuō): To speak, to say.
明 (míng): Bright, clear, to understand.

数字.explanation:
Noun meaning 'number', 'figure', 'digit'.
Component Breakdown:
数 (shù): Number.
字 (zì): Character, word.

辛苦.explanation:
Adjective meaning 'hard', 'toilsome', 'laborious'. Often used to express gratitude for someone's hard work.
Component Breakdown:
辛 (xīn): Hard, laborious, pungent.
苦 (kǔ): Bitter, hard, suffering.

严重.explanation:
Adjective meaning 'serious', 'grave', 'critical'.
Component Breakdown:
严 (yán): Strict, severe.
重 (zhòng): Heavy, serious.

研究.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to study', 'to do research'; Noun meaning 'research'.
Component Breakdown:
研 (yán): To grind, to study.
究 (jiū): To investigate, to study.

指.explanation: Verb meaning 'to point to', 'to refer to', 'to indicate'. Noun meaning 'finger'.

植物.explanation:
Noun meaning 'plant', 'flora'.
Component Breakdown:
植 (zhí): To plant.
物 (wù): Thing, matter.

长期.explanation:
Noun/Adjective meaning 'long time', 'long term'.
Component Breakdown:
长 (cháng): Long.
期 (qī): Period of time, term.

成为.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to become', 'to turn into'.
Component Breakdown:
成 (chéng): To become, to succeed.
为 (wéi): To be, as.

窗.explanation: Noun meaning 'window'. Often seen as 窗户 (chuānghu).

大使馆.explanation:
Noun meaning 'embassy'.
Component Breakdown:
大 (dà): Big, great.
使 (shǐ): To make, to cause; envoy, ambassador.
馆 (guǎn): Hall, building (e.g., embassy, library).

到处.explanation:
Adverb meaning 'everywhere', 'all around'.
Component Breakdown:
到 (dào): To arrive.
处 (chù): Place.

得到.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to get', 'to obtain', 'to gain'.
Component Breakdown:
得 (dé): To get.
到 (dào): To arrive, (resultative complement).

堵.explanation: Verb meaning 'to block up', 'to stop up', 'to be congested'.

堵车.explanation:
Verb phrase meaning 'traffic jam', 'to be stuck in traffic'.
Component Breakdown:
堵 (dǔ): To block, to be congested.
车 (chē): Car, vehicle.

发生.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to happen', 'to occur', 'to take place'.
Component Breakdown:
发 (fā): To send out, to happen.
生 (shēng): To be born, to happen.

放松.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to relax', 'to loosen'.
Component Breakdown:
放 (fàng): To put, to let go.
松 (sōng): Loose, to relax.

回忆.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to recall', 'to recollect'; Noun meaning 'memory'.
Component Breakdown:
回 (huí): To return, to circle back.
忆 (yì): To remember, memory.

积极.explanation:
Adjective meaning 'positive', 'active', 'energetic', 'enthusiastic'.
Component Breakdown:
积 (jī): To accumulate.
极 (jí): Extreme, pole.

景色.explanation:
Noun meaning 'scenery', 'view', 'landscape'.
Component Breakdown:
景 (jǐng): Scenery, view.
色 (sè): Color, view.

距离.explanation:
Noun meaning 'distance'; Verb meaning 'to be away from'.
Component Breakdown:
距 (jù): Distance, to be away from.
离 (lí): To leave, to be away from.

科学.explanation:
Noun meaning 'science'; Adjective meaning 'scientific'.
Component Breakdown:
科 (kē): Branch of study, section.
学 (xué): To study, learning, science.

耐心.explanation:
Noun meaning 'patience'; Adjective meaning 'patient'.
Component Breakdown:
耐 (nài): To endure, to be patient.
心 (xīn): Heart, mind.

女性.explanation:
Noun meaning 'woman', 'female'.
Component Breakdown:
女 (nǚ): Female, woman.
性 (xìng): Gender, nature.

亲戚.explanation:
Noun meaning 'relative', 'kin'.
Component Breakdown:
亲 (qīn): Relative, parent, close.
戚 (qi): Relative (often by marriage).

缺少.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to lack', 'to be short of'.
Component Breakdown:
缺 (quē): To lack.
少 (shǎo): Few, little, to lack.

伤心.explanation:
Adjective meaning 'sad', 'sorrowful', 'heartbroken'.
Component Breakdown:
伤 (shāng): To hurt, to injure.
心 (xīn): Heart, mind.

生命.explanation:
Noun meaning 'life' (biological sense).
Component Breakdown:
生 (shēng): Life, to be born.
命 (mìng): Life, fate, destiny.

师傅.explanation:
Noun meaning 'master' (of a trade), 'teacher'. Polite form of address for skilled workers (e.g., driver, cook).
Component Breakdown:
师 (shī): Teacher, master.
傅 (fu): Tutor, teacher (archaic).

使.explanation: Verb meaning 'to make', 'to cause', 'to enable'; 'to use'; 'envoy'.

态度.explanation:
Noun meaning 'attitude', 'manner', 'bearing'.
Component Breakdown:
态 (tài): Form, state, appearance.
度 (dù): Degree, manner.

特点.explanation:
Noun meaning 'characteristic', 'feature', 'trait'.
Component Breakdown:
特 (tè): Special, unique.
点 (diǎn): Point, aspect.

往往.explanation: Adverb meaning 'often', 'usually' (implies a pattern or tendency).

心情.explanation:
Noun meaning 'mood', 'state of mind'.
Component Breakdown:
心 (xīn): Heart, mind.
情 (qíng): Feeling, emotion.

压力.explanation:
Noun meaning 'pressure', 'stress'.
Component Breakdown:
压 (yā): To press, to push down.
力 (lì): Force, power, strength.

阳光.explanation:
Noun meaning 'sunlight'; Adjective meaning 'sunshine', 'optimistic', 'cheerful'.
Component Breakdown:
阳 (yáng): Sun, positive (yin-yang).
光 (guāng): Light, ray.

因此.explanation:
Conjunction meaning 'therefore', 'so', 'consequently'.
Component Breakdown:
因 (yīn): Because, cause.
此 (cǐ): This, therefore.

愉快.explanation:
Adjective meaning 'happy', 'cheerful', 'pleasant'.
Component Breakdown:
愉 (yú): Happy, pleased.
快 (kuài): Fast, happy, pleasant.

证明.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to prove', 'to testify'; Noun meaning 'proof', 'certificate'.
Component Breakdown:
证 (zhèng): Proof, to prove.
明 (míng): Clear, bright, to prove.

饼干.explanation:
Noun meaning 'biscuit', 'cracker', 'cookie'.
Component Breakdown:
饼 (bǐng): Cake, biscuit, pancake.
干 (gān): Dry.

当时.explanation:
Noun/Adverb meaning 'then', 'at that time'.
Component Breakdown:
当 (dāng): At (that time).
时 (shí): Time.

放弃.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to give up', 'to abandon', 'to renounce'.
Component Breakdown:
放 (fàng): To let go, to put down.
弃 (qì): To abandon, to discard.

父母.explanation:
Noun meaning 'parents' (father and mother).
Component Breakdown:
父 (fù): Father.
母 (mǔ): Mother.

国际.explanation:
Noun/Adjective meaning 'international'.
Component Breakdown:
国 (guó): Country, nation.
际 (jì): Border, between (nations).

过程.explanation:
Noun meaning 'process', 'course'.
Component Breakdown:
过 (guò): To pass, process.
程 (chéng): Course, process, journey.

坚持.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to insist on', 'to persist in', 'to uphold'.
Component Breakdown:
坚 (jiān): Firm, solid.
持 (chí): To hold, to maintain.

奖.explanation: Noun meaning 'award', 'prize'; Verb meaning 'to praise', 'to award'.

结果.explanation:
Noun meaning 'result', 'outcome', 'consequence'; Conjunction meaning 'as a result'.
Component Breakdown:
结 (jié): To tie, to form, result.
果 (guǒ): Fruit, result.

经历.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to experience', 'to go through'; Noun meaning 'experience'.
Component Breakdown:
经 (jīng): To pass through, to experience.
历 (lì): To experience, history.

可是.explanation: Conjunction meaning 'but', 'however' (similar to 但是, sometimes softer).

理想.explanation:
Noun meaning 'ideal', 'dream', 'aspiration'; Adjective meaning 'ideal'.
Component Breakdown:
理 (lǐ): Reason, ideal.
想 (xiǎng): To think, to want, idea.

面对.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to face', 'to confront'.
Component Breakdown:
面 (miàn): Face.
对 (duì): Towards, to face.

难道.explanation:
Adverb used in rhetorical questions to add emphasis, often implying 'Could it be that...?', 'Don't you...?'.
Component Breakdown:
难 (nán): Difficult.
道 (dào): Way, say.

篇.explanation: Measure word for essays, articles, papers, chapters, etc.

轻松.explanation:
Adjective meaning 'relaxed', 'easy', 'light', 'effortless'.
Component Breakdown:
轻 (qīng): Light.
松 (sōng): Loose, relaxed.

取.explanation: Verb meaning 'to take', 'to get', 'to fetch', 'to gain', 'to seek'.

区别.explanation:
Noun meaning 'difference', 'distinction'; Verb meaning 'to distinguish'.
Component Breakdown:
区 (qū): Area, to distinguish.
别 (bié): To separate, other, difference.

失败.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to fail'; Noun meaning 'failure', 'defeat'.
Component Breakdown:
失 (shī): To lose, to fail.
败 (bài): To be defeated, to fail.

随便.explanation:
Adjective/Adverb meaning 'casual', 'at random', 'as one pleases', 'whatever'.
Component Breakdown:
随 (suí): To follow, to let.
便 (biàn): Convenient, then.

通过.explanation:
Preposition meaning 'through', 'by means of'; Verb meaning 'to pass', 'to get through', 'to adopt (a resolution)'.
Component Breakdown:
通 (tōng): To go through, to pass.
过 (guò): To pass, to cross.

网球.explanation:
Noun meaning 'tennis'.
Component Breakdown:
网 (wǎng): Net.
球 (qiú): Ball.

许多.explanation:
Numeral/Adjective meaning 'many', 'a lot of', 'plenty of'.
Component Breakdown:
许 (xǔ): To allow, perhaps, many.
多 (duō): Many, much.

勇敢.explanation:
Adjective meaning 'brave', 'courageous'.
Component Breakdown:
勇 (yǒng): Brave.
敢 (gǎn): To dare, bold.

暂时.explanation:
Noun/Adverb meaning 'temporary', 'for the time being', 'temporarily'.
Component Breakdown:
暂 (zàn): Temporary.
时 (shí): Time.

正确.explanation:
Adjective meaning 'correct', 'right', 'proper'.
Component Breakdown:
正 (zhèng): Right, correct.
确 (què): Sure, certain, true.

至少.explanation:
Adverb meaning 'at least'.
Component Breakdown:
至 (zhì): To, until, most.
少 (shǎo): Few, little.

主意.explanation:
Noun meaning 'idea', 'plan', 'decision'.
Component Breakdown:
主 (zhǔ): Main, master, idea.
意 (yì): Idea, meaning.

总结.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to sum up', 'to summarize'; Noun meaning 'summary', 'conclusion'.
Component Breakdown:
总 (zǒng): Total, chief, always.
结 (jié): To tie, to conclude.

作家.explanation:
Noun meaning 'writer', 'author'.
Component Breakdown:
作 (zuò): To write, to make.
家 (jiā): Family, expert.

比如.explanation:
Verb/Conjunction meaning 'for example', 'for instance', 'such as'.
Component Breakdown:
比 (bǐ): To compare.
如 (rú): As, like.

答案.explanation:
Noun meaning 'answer', 'key', 'solution'.
Component Breakdown:
答 (dá): To answer.
案 (àn): Case, record, plan.

等.explanation: Particle meaning 'etc.', 'and so on'. Verb meaning 'to wait'.

发展.explanation:
Verb meaning 'to develop', 'to grow', 'to expand'; Noun meaning 'development'.
Component Breakdown:
发 (fā): To develop, to send out.
展 (zhǎn): To unfold, to expand.

翻译.explanation:
Noun meaning 'translator', 'interpreter'; Verb meaning 'to translate', 'to interpret'.
Component Breakdown:
翻 (fān): To turn over, to translate.
译 (yì): To translate, to interpret.

方向.explanation:
Noun meaning 'direction', 'orientation'.
Component Breakdown:
方 (fāng): Direction, side.
向 (xiàng): Towards, direction.

关键.explanation:
Noun meaning 'key', 'crux', 'hinge'; Adjective meaning 'crucial', 'key'.
Component Breakdown:
关 (guān): To close, to concern; key point.
键 (jiàn): Key (of a lock or keyboard).

建议.explanation:
Noun meaning 'suggestion', 'advice'; Verb meaning 'to suggest', 'to advise'.
Component Breakdown:
建 (jiàn): To build, to establish.
议 (yì): To discuss, suggestion.

将来.explanation:
Noun meaning 'future'.
Component Breakdown:
将 (jiāng): Will, about to.
来 (lái): To come.

经济.explanation:
Noun meaning 'economy'; Adjective meaning 'economical'.
Component Breakdown:
经 (jīng): To manage, to pass through.
济 (jì): To aid, to cross a river.

空儿.explanation:
Noun meaning 'free time', 'spare time' (colloquial, with 'r' suffix).
Component Breakdown:
空 (kòng): Empty, free time.
儿 (r): Suffix.

礼拜天.explanation:
Noun meaning 'Sunday'.
Component Breakdown:
礼拜 (lǐbài): Week, religious service.
天 (tiān): Day, sky.

母亲.explanation:
Noun meaning 'mother' (more formal than 妈妈).
Component Breakdown:
母 (mǔ): Mother.
亲 (qīn): Parent, relative.

确实.explanation:
Adverb meaning 'truly', 'indeed', 'really'; Adjective meaning 'reliable'.
Component Breakdown:
确 (què): True, sure.
实 (shí): Real, true.

硕士.explanation:
Noun meaning 'Master's degree', 'Master' (person holding the degree).
Component Breakdown:
硕 (shuò): Large, great.
士 (shì): Scholar, person.

条件.explanation:
Noun meaning 'condition', 'requirement', 'term'.
Component Breakdown:
条 (tiáo): Strip, item, condition.
件 (jiàn): Item, piece, condition.

橡皮.explanation:
Noun meaning 'eraser', 'rubber'.
Component Breakdown:
橡 (xiàng): Oak, rubber tree.
皮 (pí): Skin, leather, rubber.

兴奋.explanation:
Adjective meaning 'excited'; Noun meaning 'excitement'.
Component Breakdown:
兴 (xīng): To rise, to prosper, interest.
奋 (fèn): To exert, to arouse.

永远.explanation:
Adverb meaning 'forever', 'always', 'perpetually'.
Component Breakdown:
永 (yǒng): Forever, perpetual.
远 (yuǎn): Far, distant.

优秀.explanation:
Adjective meaning 'excellent', 'outstanding', 'distinguished'.
Component Breakdown:
优 (yōu): Excellent.
秀 (xiù): Excellent, beautiful.

职业.explanation:
Noun meaning 'occupation', 'profession', 'vocation'.
Component Breakdown:
职 (zhí): Duty, post, occupation.
业 (yè): Profession, industry, enterprise.

金钱.explanation:
Noun meaning 'money', 'currency'.
Component Breakdown:
金 (jīn): Gold, money.
钱 (qián): Money, coin.

里面.explanation:
Noun meaning 'inside', 'interior'.
Component Breakdown:
里 (lǐ): Inside.
面 (miàn): Side, surface.

判断力.explanation:
Noun meaning 'judgment', 'ability to judge'.
Component Breakdown:
判断 (pànduàn): Judgment, to judge.
力 (lì): Power, ability.

葡萄汁.explanation:
Noun meaning 'grape juice'.
Component Breakdown:
葡萄 (pútao): Grape.
汁 (zhī): Juice.

心烦.explanation:
Adjective meaning 'annoyed', 'vexed', 'irritated'.
Component Breakdown:
心 (xīn): Heart, mind.
烦 (fán): Annoyed, vexed.

友情.explanation:
Noun meaning 'friendship'.
Component Breakdown:
友 (yǒu): Friend.
情 (qíng): Feeling, sentiment.

优质.explanation:
Adjective meaning 'high quality', 'premium'.
Component Breakdown:
优 (yōu): Excellent.
质 (zhì): Quality.
